Class Monitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.moglan.eac.model.connection.TCPServer
      • com.moglan.eac.model.connection.Monitor

  • public class Monitor
extends TCPServer
    Monitors multiple clients and counts the total number of messages received.
    Author:
    Vlad-Adrian Moglan
